comments.body: Does this have any performance implications for branches without array data members?

One implication is that getting the internal C++ object of a Python proxy requires one extra access, since the pointer to the object becomes a pointer to a structure with more data (see [here](https://github.com/root-project/root/blob/master/bindings/pyroot/cppyy/CPyCppyy/src/CPPInstance.cxx#L73)). For what concerns the access to other (non-array) data members, it does not seem to have an impact, from what I can see [here](https://github.com/root-project/root/blob/master/bindings/pyroot/cppyy/CPyCppyy/src/CPPDataMember.cxx#L27).
